about.title: about Us
about.part1: PrimeMechatronics is an engineering company specializing in custom instrument development, robotics, automation, laser and measuring equipment, and optical instruments. Our team offers highly qualified engineering solutions, short lead times, and competitive pricing
about.part2: We are proud of our specialists, who are ready to implement the most complex projects, providing clients with the highest level of professionalism and quality

services.title: Services
services.service2: Design of Laser and Optical Devices
services.service4: Preparation of Specifications and Technical Projects, Visualization

contact.title: Contact us
contact.comment: Describe the task and we will respond promptly
